text.div:
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/statistic-model-code defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
effectsFixed Fixed-effects meta-analysisFrom a fixed-effects meta-analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
effectsRandom Random-effects meta-analysisFrom a random-effects meta-analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
methodTau Tau estimation methodMethod used for estimating tau squared (used with a random-effects meta-analysis), pair with valueCodeableConcept.
poolMethod Pooling methodMethod used to pool results, pair with valueCodeableConcept.
hartungKnapp Hartung-Knapp adjustmentHartung-Knapp/Hartung-Knapp-Sidik-Jonkman adjustment used, pair with valueBoolean.
modifiedHartungKnapp Modified Hartung-Knapp adjustmentModified Hartung-Knapp/Hartung-Knapp-Sidik-Jonkman adjustment used, pair with valueBoolean.
zeroCellNumerical Zero-cell adjustment with constantZero-cell adjustment done by adding a constant to all cells of affected studies, pair with valueSimpleQuantity.
zeroCellTreatmentArmContinuityCorrection Zero-cell adjustment with continuity correctionZero-cell adjustment done by treatment arm continuity correction, pair with valueBoolean.
adjusted Adjusted analysisUsed for adjusted analysis, pair with variable instead of value[x].
linearRegression Linear RegressionUsed for linear regression method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
logisticRegression Logistic RegressionUsed for logistic regression method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
anova Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)Used for ANOVA method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
coxProportionalHazards Cox Proportional HazardsUsed for Cox proportional hazards method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.

concept.definition: From a fixed-effects meta-analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
From a random-effects meta-analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
Method used for estimating tau squared (used with a random-effects meta-analysis), pair with valueCodeableConcept.
Method used to pool results, pair with valueCodeableConcept.
Hartung-Knapp/Hartung-Knapp-Sidik-Jonkman adjustment used, pair with valueBoolean.
Modified Hartung-Knapp/Hartung-Knapp-Sidik-Jonkman adjustment used, pair with valueBoolean.
Zero-cell adjustment done by adding a constant to all cells of affected studies, pair with valueSimpleQuantity.
Zero-cell adjustment done by treatment arm continuity correction, pair with valueBoolean.
Used for adjusted analysis, pair with variable instead of value[x].
Used for linear regression method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
Used for logistic regression method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
Used for ANOVA method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
Used for Cox proportional hazards method of analysis, pair with valueBoolean.
